thread.title: Deadspin Editor-in-Chief: ‘Ted Cruz is a pathetic a**hole’ and his supporters have ‘low-testosterone’
thread.title_full: Deadspin Editor-in-Chief: ‘Ted Cruz is a pathetic a**hole’ and his supporters have ‘low-testosterone’

author: Greg P.
title: Deadspin Editor-in-Chief: ‘Ted Cruz is a pathetic a**hole’ and his supporters have ‘low-testosterone’
text:
Deadspin Editor-in-Chief: ‘Ted Cruz is a pathetic a**hole’ and his supporters have ‘low-testosterone’ Posted at 7:26 am on January 25, 2017 by Greg P. 
Deadspin ‘s Editor-in-Chief Tim Marchman went on the warpath last night defending his reporter, Ashley Feinberg, over the now infamous Ted Cruz-Deadspin Twitter war . Check it out: Amazing that low-testosterone Ted Cruz enthusiasts are comfortable haranguing @ashleyfeinberg but not me, Deadspin's actual editor! 
— Tim Marchman (@timmarchman) January 25, 2017 Ted Cruz is a pathetic asshole, his social media intern's joke was basic, and complaints should go to marchman at deadspin dot com. 
— Tim Marchman (@timmarchman) January 25, 2017 Unsurprising that not one Ted Cruz-supporting cuck/Twitter user is willing to face me in the UFC octagon. 
— Tim Marchman (@timmarchman) January 25, 2017 Hundreds of dudes who can't do a pushup are tweeting at me but literally not even one has had the brass to send me an email. 
— Tim Marchman (@timmarchman) January 25, 2017 
He seems nice. Trending
